tabs.Overview:
Jay is one of the deuteragonist of [[tboah]] and a member of [[e-class]]. He possess a strong strength of will in his desire to become a Hero. 

[[toc]]

# Appearance
Jay has a clean crew cut with average looking face. He is tall compared to his classmates and he possess a dark brown skin. He usually wear his uniform in a rebellious manner, with unbuttoned shirt, and raised over pants.

# Personality
Jay has a strong and domineering personality, unafraid in calling out the wrongs he sees as well as fighting head on even in the face of defeat. He is also rather prideful in his image of himself and will fight anyone that calls him a villain.

# History
Jay came from a troubled household. His parents were both drug addicts and he was raised in a dangerous hood filled with criminal gang and violence. When his elder brother, [[Jaime Baker]] became 18, he finally have had enough and took Jay with him and left their parents. Raising Jay by himself, his elder brother worked many side jobs in order to put food in the table.

Little to Jay's knowledge, his brother slowly turned back to a life of crime for easier money, often aiding in robberies to get a percentage. But [[Jaime Baker|Jaime]] eventually felt conflicted and decided to quit the life of a criminal, returning back to doing odd jobs.

The now 20 years old Jaime saw how his 14 years old little brother wanted to be a doctor. Not wanting him to be like him and lose his dreams and go into a life of crime, Jaime became determine to fulfill his little brother's wish. But Jaime's past caught up to him, leading him to making a deal with [[Rosweiss]], who, in exchange for a huge sum of money, would have exclusive use over [[Jaime Baker|Jaime's]]  unique [[Psion]], the [[Overboost]], the ability to boost the strength of any abilities.

Jaime accepted and left Jay to the care of his trusted best friend, [[Tagle]]. 

Jay, not knowing any of this, was told that his brother went missing. As per his instructions, Tagle will tell jay the truth after he became an adult.

Determined to find out what truly happened, and against the voices of those which call his brother a villain, Jay decided to enter UHA and become a Hero in order to find the reason.

# Abilities
- **Superstrength** - The ability to have superhuman strength. 

**Weakness**: Because Jay does not have a hardened skin, should he overuse his superstrength, it'll cause his skin to break and bleed.
